attributes.title: Didn’t like it overall worst app ever
attributes.review: I didn’t like this app it took two weeks to download. I wanted to see reasons to vote for him or something good about him for once.The platform though was completely disgusting it was hard to find certain things.Everything was so unorganized and gross he just made matters worse with this app DO NOT RECOMMEND AT ALL! Worst thing ever!

attributes.title: VIRUS
attributes.review: I got a virus on my phone because of this app. It is the worst app ever there was so many glitches.This app is also very unprofessional and stole some of my information. In conclusion don’t get this app.

attributes.title: Die you old orange pedophile🥰✌🏻
attributes.review: Die Donald pls and thank u i am scarred from what i have experienced when i first opened the app i saw a crusty cheeto and im still horrified thix a lot 😔✌🏻

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: The app didn’t load until two days after I downloaded it they were pop-up ads all throughout it. When I entered my phone number into it for them to send me emails it  spammed me with a bunch of inappropriate things.Do not GET

attributes.title: definitely do not recommend
attributes.review: this app was horrible! i downloaded to get the latest news on our president to only find out the glitches and it randomly shuts my phone on and off when i’m on it. i took my phone to best buy the other day to find out i had 3 different viruses on my phone after downloading this app. it will ruin your phone i had to buy a new one and that won’t be in the mail for months. DO NOT GET THIS APP

attributes.title: Makes me gag
attributes.review: This app is so bad, I be feeling like throwing up.If I would need to go to the hospital, y’all better pay for my hospital bills.Also I was trying to look for my president but all I see is a talking Cheeto.This app also alerted my phobia to ugly people...

attributes.title: This app made me homeless
attributes.userName: trump is a ra_ist C or P
attributes.review: This app made my iPad glitch and it insulted trump then it gave out all my information on to the internet then it 😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭broke my tv bc my iPad has made sounds that where 100000000000000000000000000000000 hertz then it brought a tornado so now it destroyed my house, I’m homeless now😭😭😭😭😭😭😭
